sense.def:
To scan an area, group of things, or piece of writing
pomeni natančno si ogledati območje, skupino stvari ali besedilo, ponavadi zato, ker nekaj iščemo.

seg.quote: Anxiously Carol scanned their faces to see who she might know.
...lifeguards scanning the sea for shark fins.

sense.def:
Kadar stroj
scans something
, nekaj hitro pregleda, na primer s premikanjem svetlobnega ali rentgenskega žarka.

seg.quote: The reconnaissance plane's job was to scan the oceans with its radar.
